attributes.comment:
The fee increase is an additional burden to the many adopting parents who are filing to adopt a
child, particularly a child from China. We have already paid the fee for the application of the I 600A
and fingerprinting. The wait for a child has increased and is expected to become longer. Therefore
we will have to refile, which is an added expense to an already very expensive process.
I do not believe that couples who are trying to adopt a child should have to pay to refile. For the fee
to increase for those of us who have already paid once is absolutely horrible, adding to the financial
and emotional stress of a long, hard adoptive journey.
Sincerely,
Paula Hall

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Paula P. Hall
